Posts.Content: Dec 25, 2009 02:24AM Vegasmom wrote: I too have lost my eyelashes & eyebrows, about 3 monthes after finishing my chemo. (I never lost them during chemo) I am still on herceptin.  My hair on my head is growing slowly but surely, and the eyelashes look like they are growing, but my eyebrows will not grow!!!  I too am wondering if my eyebrows will ever grow back or if I should get them tatooed.  Did anyone else have this eyebrow problem 3 monthes after chemo & did they eventually grow back??? Suepen, just wanted to say TCH my hair started to really fall out on day 17 after my first chemo treatment. The majority of it was gone within 3 days.  Every treatment it just continued to fall out more.  Don't hold onto it, cuz  I did, what little hair that was left will fall out after chemo, when the new starts growing in.
Posts.Title: Hair Hair Hair - Another question Deen Krose53
